snippet: The last California got a bit lost in the company’s other high-performance models, but the latest version drives like a true member of the Ferrari family.
abstract: Driven column review of 2015 Ferrari California T.
lead_paragraph: The last California got a bit lost in the company’s other high-performance models, but the latest version drives like a true member of the Ferrari family.

headline.print_headline: The California Lives Up to the Ferrari Name
headline.main: Video Review: The California Lives Up to the Ferrari Name
